name: She Was A Dream
description:
A SHORT INTERACTIVE STORY : 

 The quest of an akward lesbian tryna make her dreams come true. 

Will you be able to seduce one of them ? 

!//Disclaimer//! : Partial Nudity, Swearing

CHARACTERS : 

Her

She never left your memory, 

She's the spring and she's the rain

She's the crush you've never been able to talk to

but destiny gave you a chance

Will you take it ? Will you succeed ?

°      °      °      °      °      °      °

R▌║█│▌

A phantom from your past 

with messy mascara and bloody scarlet lips

A girl you loved so, so bad 

And you still have poison on your lips 

from all the toxic kisses you gave her.

FEATURES : 

  • 2 Endings
  • +30 different choices 
  • Poetry and dates with cute girls 

P.S // This is my VERY first finished game. I really hope you'll like it <3 So PLEASE don't hesitate to give me any feedback, I would appreciate it so much !

CONTACT : 

If you want to contact me, to ask me questions if you need any help, or just drop me a message about the game, you can pm me on Twitter @XMorphixx :D or send me an email morphixgame@gmail.com

CREDITS :

  • Art, Characters and Story :

Morphea (Me)

  • Music :

Clann - Her & the sea / The Faerie Court (Under Sun) / Unseelie

Tibauthe Traveler - Ember / Bright lights 

Rad - First date 

Nom - A moment to remember

Burbank - Sorry I like you 

S N U G x Mondo Loops – Mahogany

  • Backgrounds (bedroom, coffeeshop, street) are not mine.
